title: Quran - القران

creator: Islamicapps.org
descriptionHtml:
Quran offers you the latest programs that have been developed to serve the user by making use of the available modern technologies.

Amazing design with latest Hafs edition (Uthmanic Mushaf).

The program provides many great features:

1- Slider for easy navigation between pages.
2- Interpretation (Tafseer) of the Meanings of the Noble Qur'an (Facilitated interpretation - التفسير الميسر).
3- Night reading mode.
4- Live steam from Makkah (Qur`an channel) and Al-Madeena (Al-Sunnah channel) 24/7.
5- Allows to save pages for later read.
6- Read Qur`an offline.
7- And many more.

The program is ads free.
Fast, simple and easy to use & also easy to share with family and friends.
